page.title: 07A RETIRED PERSON'S DAY
page.content: I RISE ABOUT 8:30 AM AND MAKE A CUP OF TEA.THEN I LIGHT MY COAL FIRE.AFTER MY BREAKFAST OF CEREAL,TOAST AND MARMALADE,I CLEAN AND DUST THE KITCHEN. LATER I VISIT MY NEIGHBOUR,WHO IS HOUSEBOUND,TO SEE IF ANYTHING NEEDS TO BE DONE AND TO HAVE A FRIENDLY CHAT. AFTER EATING LUNCH I POP DOWN TO THE VILLAGE TO DO MY DAILY SHOPPING AND CHANGE LIBRARY BOOKS FOR MY NEIGHBOUR AND MYSELF.I USUALLY SPEND TIME CHATTING WITH FRIENDS I MEET.I AM ON SEVERAL COMMITTEES WHICH KEEPS ME QUITE BUSY AND ACTIVE THROUGH THE WEEK.AFTER TEA,IF I HAVE NO MEETINGS I SETTLE DOWN TO WATCH T.V. AND READ. BY 11:00 PM I USUALLY GO TO BED.
